metadata.title: CVE-2024-0093 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU software for Linux contains a vulnerability where it can exposesensitive information to an actor that is not explicitly authorized to haveaccess to that information. A successful exploit of this vulnerabilitymight lead to information disclosure.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.

linux-gcp package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.

nvidia-graphics-drivers-304: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
nvidia-graphics-drivers-340: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
nvidia-graphics-drivers-384 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
